description: This wet and wonderful Awesome park Water World (first ever in Bangladesh) features gallons of fun rides and attractions, from riveting to relaxing. The whole family can enjoy the tides of the wave pool and other rides.And the Rides are:Wave Pool,Family Curve Slide,Chute Slide,Wave Runner,Doom Slide,Multi-Play Zone,Rain Dance,Mist & Fall

Greeneries and vintage cottages will give you a feel that you are in a village with exclusive facilities while in Awesome Village.
